doc.field: Cass Gilbert papers and architectural drawings
Cass Gilbert papers and architectural drawings
Series VI. Record Books of Drawings
Series VI. Record Books of Drawings

The record books contain lists of drawings issued and received by Cass Gilbert. The list assigns a number for each drawing and provides information on the date issued and received, the name of the building, the type of drawing, and a description.
